package.description: The nxt_robot_2.0_quick_start package provides a starting nxt robot. For instructions on building the nxt robot load the quick_start.lxf into the LEGO Digital Designer (ldd.lego.com) and select the building guide mode. This robot use the nxt lego ultrasonic sensor, the hitechnic gryo sensor, and the hitechnic acclerometer sensor.
package.author: Melonee Wise
